name: BIRD2300
description:
Controls:

  • Mouse to move camera
  • TAB: Tab In / Tab Out from your laptop
  • Tabbed in :
    • WASD to move
    • Left Click to fire
    • R to reload
  • Tabbed Out
    • Left Click notebook to bring it up
    • Left Click facts in notebook to answer teacher's questions

Objective:

  • Collect bird facts to be able to answer your teacher's questions.
  • Use the notebook to answer their questions.
  • Answer questions in time to avoid losing class participation grade

Change Log:

2/8 3:00am EST

  • Fixed audio and input issues. 
  • Will add a more accurate change log soon.

2/8 4:30am EST

  • Fixed an issue with a soft lock in the credits scene.

2/8 11:00pm EST

  • Fixed question timer display not updating
  • Fixed extreme lighting when first loading inner game and in credits
  • Fixed text clipping on edges of notebook
  • No longer able to submit answers when notebook was closed
  • No longer able to collect bird facts more than once per collectable
  • Disabled collision on dead enemies
  • Enabled bird classmates
  • Separated overlapping UI Enabled "S" rank (no one will ever get it lol)
